source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT
    transaction_id,
    REPLACE(
        REPLACE(
            REPLACE(cpx.country_code, 'KSA', 'SAU'), 
            'UAE', 'ARE'
        ), 
        'INT', ''
    ) AS country_code,
    client_id,
    order_id,
    customer_type,
    CASE
        -- Specific replacements first
        WHEN cpx.client_name LIKE '%Beluar Bukhoor%' THEN 'Beluar'
        WHEN cpx.client_name LIKE '%Foot locker%' THEN 'Footlocker'
        WHEN cpx.client_name LIKE '%Levelshoes%' THEN 'Level Shoes'
        WHEN cpx.client_name LIKE '%Mr. Mandoob%' THEN 'Mrmandoob'
        WHEN cpx.client_name LIKE '%Sun & Sand%' THEN 'Sun & Sands Sports'
        WHEN cpx.client_name LIKE '%HOMEBOX%' THEN 'Home Box'
        WHEN cpx.client_name = '6thstreet' THEN '6th Street'
        WHEN cpx.client_name = 'Bath & body works' THEN 'Bath and body works'
        WHEN cpx.client_name LIKE '%Airalo%' THEN 'Airalo'
        WHEN cpx.client_name = 'Toysrus' THEN 'Toys r us'
        WHEN cpx.client_name = 'First cry' THEN 'Firstcry'
        WHEN cpx.client_name = 'Foot locker' THEN 'Footlocker'
        WHEN cpx.client_name = 'Go sport' THEN 'Go sports'
        WHEN cpx.client_name = 'Izil' THEN 'Izil Beauty'
        WHEN cpx.client_name LIKE '%Munch%' THEN 'Munch bakery'
        WHEN cpx.client_name LIKE '%Basharacare%' THEN 'Bashara Care'
        WHEN cpx.client_name LIKE '%Dropkicks%' THEN 'Dropkick'
        WHEN cpx.client_name LIKE '%Temu%' THEN 'Temu'

        -- Handle common patterns
        WHEN cpx.client_name LIKE '% CPS - Influencers%' THEN REPLACE(cpx.client_name, ' CPS - Influencers', '')
        WHEN cpx.client_name LIKE '% _Coupons%' THEN REPLACE(cpx.client_name, ' _Coupons', '')
        WHEN cpx.client_name LIKE '% CPS-KSA, UAE and KWT%' THEN REPLACE(cpx.client_name, ' CPS-KSA, UAE and KWT', '')
        WHEN cpx.client_name LIKE '% CPS \KSA Coupon%' THEN REPLACE(cpx.client_name, ' CPS \KSA Coupon ', '')
        WHEN cpx.client_name LIKE '% CPS - Coupons UAE & KSA%' THEN REPLACE(cpx.client_name, ' CPS - Coupons UAE & KSA', '')
        WHEN cpx.client_name LIKE '% CPS - Coupons UAE and KSA%' THEN REPLACE(cpx.client_name, ' CPS - Coupons UAE and KSA', '')
        WHEN cpx.client_name LIKE '% KSA & UAE%' THEN REPLACE(cpx.client_name, ' KSA & UAE', '')
        WHEN cpx.client_name LIKE '%CPS GCC-Coupons%' THEN REPLACE(cpx.client_name, 'CPS GCC-Coupons', '')
        WHEN cpx.client_name LIKE '%- CPS Coupons GCC%' THEN REPLACE(cpx.client_name, '- CPS Coupons GCC', '')
        WHEN cpx.client_name LIKE '%- CPS Links%' THEN REPLACE(cpx.client_name, '- CPS Links', '')
        WHEN cpx.client_name LIKE '%-CPS%' THEN REPLACE(cpx.client_name, '-CPS', '')
        WHEN cpx.client_name LIKE '%KSA- CPS%' THEN REPLACE(cpx.client_name, 'KSA- CPS', '')
        WHEN cpx.client_name LIKE '%- CPS%' THEN REPLACE(cpx.client_name, '- CPS', '')
        WHEN cpx.client_name LIKE '%CPS%' THEN REPLACE(cpx.client_name, 'CPS', '')
        WHEN cpx.client_name LIKE '%Coupons%' THEN REPLACE(cpx.client_name, 'Coupons', '')
        WHEN cpx.client_name LIKE '%_CPS' THEN REPLACE(cpx.client_name, '_CPS', '')
        WHEN cpx.client_name LIKE '%_CPO' THEN REPLACE(cpx.client_name, '_CPO', '')
        WHEN cpx.client_name LIKE '%_web' THEN REPLACE(cpx.client_name, '_web', '')
        WHEN cpx.client_name LIKE '%_ksa' THEN REPLACE(cpx.client_name, '_ksa', '')
        WHEN cpx.client_name LIKE '% - plt%' THEN REPLACE(cpx.client_name, ' - plt', '')
        WHEN cpx.client_name LIKE '% - maf%' THEN REPLACE(cpx.client_name, ' - maf', '')
        WHEN cpx.client_name LIKE '% - rakuten%' THEN REPLACE(cpx.client_name, ' - rakuten', '')
        WHEN cpx.client_name LIKE '% (tbs)' THEN REPLACE(cpx.client_name, ' (tbs)', '')
        WHEN cpx.client_name LIKE '% (durrapro)' THEN REPLACE(cpx.client_name, ' (durrapro)', '')

        -- General replacements
        WHEN cpx.client_name LIKE '%_%' THEN REPLACE(cpx.client_name, '_', ' ')

        ELSE cpx.client_name
    END AS client_name,
    currency,
    country,
    coupon_code,
    order_net,
    order_gross,
    revenue_gross,
    revenue_net,
    gross_revenue_aed,
    net_revenue_aed,
    cpo_or_cps,
    cancellation_rate,
    commission_rate,
    payout_rate,
    net_revenue_calc,
    net_orders_calc,
    gross_commission,
    net_commission,
    gross_payout,
    net_payout,
    created_at,
    order_date,
    team_name,
    channel_name,
    function_name,
    contact_name,
    contact_record_id,
    company_record_id,
    team_record_id,
    channel_record_id,
    function_record_id,
    coupon_record_id,
    coupon_status,
    REPLACE(
        REPLACE(
            REPLACE(UPPER(cpx.order_status), 'COMPLETED', 'COMPLETE'), 
            'outfordelivery', 'Out For Delivery'
        ), 
        'returned_to_shipper', 'Returned To Shipper'
    ) AS order_status,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS update_timestamp
FROM 
    raw.cpx_raw AS cpx
WHERE 
    cpx.team_name = 'SSC';

SELECT
    campaign_name,
    campaign_id,
    automation,
    last_updated_at,
    campaign_start_year,
    code,
    date,
    original_currency,
    REPLACE(
        REPLACE(
            REPLACE(ara.country, 'KSA', 'SAU'),
            'UAE', 'ARE'
        ),
        'INT', ''
    ) AS country,
    CASE 
        WHEN ara.customer_type = 'new' THEN 'New'
        ELSE 'Returning' 
    END AS customer_type,
    ad_set,
    month,
    month_number,
    order_id,
    CASE
        -- Specific replacements first
        WHEN ara.brand LIKE '%Beluar Bukhoor%' THEN 'Beluar'
        WHEN ara.brand LIKE '%Foot locker%' THEN 'Footlocker'
        WHEN ara.brand LIKE '%Levelshoes%' THEN 'Level Shoes'
        WHEN ara.brand LIKE '%Mr. Mandoob%' THEN 'Mrmandoob'
        WHEN ara.brand LIKE '%Sun & Sand%' THEN 'Sun & Sands Sports'
        WHEN ara.brand LIKE '%HOMEBOX%' THEN 'Home Box'
        WHEN ara.brand = '6thstreet' THEN '6th Street'
        WHEN ara.brand = 'Bath & body works' THEN 'Bath and body works'
        WHEN ara.brand LIKE '%Airalo%' THEN 'Airalo'
        WHEN ara.brand = 'Toysrus' THEN 'Toys r us'
        WHEN ara.brand = 'First cry' THEN 'Firstcry'
        WHEN ara.brand = 'Foot locker' THEN 'Footlocker'
        WHEN ara.brand = 'Go sport' THEN 'Go sports'
        WHEN ara.brand = 'Izil' THEN 'Izil Beauty'
        WHEN ara.brand LIKE '%Munch%' THEN 'Munch bakery'
        WHEN ara.brand LIKE '%Basharacare%' THEN 'Bashara Care'
        WHEN ara.brand LIKE '%Dropkicks%' THEN 'Dropkick'
        WHEN ara.brand LIKE '%Temu%' THEN 'Temu'

        -- Handle common patterns
        WHEN ara.brand LIKE '% CPS - Influencers%' THEN REPLACE(ara.brand, ' CPS - Influencers', '')
        WHEN ara.brand LIKE '% _Coupons%' THEN REPLACE(ara.brand, ' _Coupons', '')
        WHEN ara.brand LIKE '% CPS-KSA, UAE and KWT%' THEN REPLACE(ara.brand, ' CPS-KSA, UAE and KWT', '')
        WHEN ara.brand LIKE '% CPS \KSA Coupon%' THEN REPLACE(ara.brand, ' CPS \KSA Coupon ', '')
        WHEN ara.brand LIKE '% CPS - Coupons UAE & KSA%' THEN REPLACE(ara.brand, ' CPS - Coupons UAE & KSA', '')
        WHEN ara.brand LIKE '% CPS - Coupons UAE and KSA%' THEN REPLACE(ara.brand, ' CPS - Coupons UAE and KSA', '')
        WHEN ara.brand LIKE '% KSA & UAE%' THEN REPLACE(ara.brand, ' KSA & UAE', '')
        WHEN ara.brand LIKE '%CPS GCC-Coupons%' THEN REPLACE(ara.brand, 'CPS GCC-Coupons', '')
        WHEN ara.brand LIKE '%- CPS Coupons GCC%' THEN REPLACE(ara.brand, '- CPS Coupons GCC', '')
        WHEN ara.brand LIKE '%- CPS Links%' THEN REPLACE(ara.brand, '- CPS Links', '')
        WHEN ara.brand LIKE '%-CPS%' THEN REPLACE(ara.brand, '-CPS', '')
        WHEN ara.brand LIKE '%KSA- CPS%' THEN REPLACE(ara.brand, 'KSA- CPS', '')
        WHEN ara.brand LIKE '%- CPS%' THEN REPLACE(ara.brand, '- CPS', '')
        WHEN ara.brand LIKE '%CPS%' THEN REPLACE(ara.brand, 'CPS', '')
        WHEN ara.brand LIKE '%Coupons%' THEN REPLACE(ara.brand, 'Coupons', '')
        WHEN ara.brand LIKE '%_CPS' THEN REPLACE(ara.brand, '_CPS', '')
        WHEN ara.brand LIKE '%_CPO' THEN REPLACE(ara.brand, '_CPO', '')
        WHEN ara.brand LIKE '%_web' THEN REPLACE(ara.brand, '_web', '')
        WHEN ara.brand LIKE '%_ksa' THEN REPLACE(ara.brand, '_ksa', '')
        WHEN ara.brand LIKE '% - plt%' THEN REPLACE(ara.brand, ' - plt', '')
        WHEN ara.brand LIKE '% - maf%' THEN REPLACE(ara.brand, ' - maf', '')
        WHEN ara.brand LIKE '% - rakuten%' THEN REPLACE(ara.brand, ' - rakuten', '')
        WHEN ara.brand LIKE '% (tbs)' THEN REPLACE(ara.brand, ' (tbs)', '')
        WHEN ara.brand LIKE '% (durrapro)' THEN REPLACE(ara.brand, ' (durrapro)', '')

        -- General replacements
        WHEN ara.brand LIKE '%_%' THEN REPLACE(ara.brand, '_', ' ')

        ELSE ara.brand
    END AS brand,
    customer_returning_days,
    legal_entity_name,
    aov,
    action_type_label,
    business_category_label,
    orders,
    revenue,
    input_file_name,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS update_timestamp
FROM 
    raw.arabyads_raw AS ara

select
[ORDER DATE],
ADVERTISER,
PLATFORM,
COUNTRY,
[COUPON CODE],
TIER,
[TOTAL ORDERS],
[NON-PAYABLE ORDERS],
[TOTAL VALUE],
[FTU ORDERS],
[FTU ORDER VALUE],
[RTU ORDERS]
input_file_name,
CURRENT_TIMESTAMP as update_timestamp
from raw.noon_raw

SELECT
    CASE
        -- Specific replacements first
        WHEN dig.[Offer.name] LIKE '%Beluar Bukhoor%' THEN 'Beluar'
        WHEN dig.[Offer.name] LIKE '%Foot locker%' THEN 'Footlocker'
        WHEN dig.[Offer.name] LIKE '%Levelshoes%' THEN 'Level Shoes'
        WHEN dig.[Offer.name] LIKE '%Mr. Mandoob%' THEN 'Mrmandoob'
        WHEN dig.[Offer.name] LIKE '%Sun & Sand%' THEN 'Sun & Sands Sports'
        WHEN dig.[Offer.name] LIKE '%HOMEBOX%' THEN 'Home Box'
        WHEN dig.[Offer.name] = '6thstreet' THEN '6th Street'
        WHEN dig.[Offer.name] = 'Bath & body works' THEN 'Bath and body works'
        WHEN dig.[Offer.name] LIKE '%Airalo%' THEN 'Airalo'
        WHEN dig.[Offer.name] = 'Toysrus' THEN 'Toys r us'
        WHEN dig.[Offer.name] = 'First cry' THEN 'Firstcry'
        WHEN dig.[Offer.name] = 'Foot locker' THEN 'Footlocker'
        WHEN dig.[Offer.name] = 'Go sport' THEN 'Go sports'
        WHEN dig.[Offer.name] = 'Izil' THEN 'Izil Beauty'
        WHEN dig.[Offer.name] LIKE '%Munch%' THEN 'Munch bakery'
        WHEN dig.[Offer.name] LIKE '%Basharacare%' THEN 'Bashara Care'
        WHEN dig.[Offer.name] LIKE '%Dropkicks%' THEN 'Dropkick'
        WHEN dig.[Offer.name] LIKE '%Temu%' THEN 'Temu'

        -- Handle common patterns
        WHEN dig.[Offer.name] LIKE '% CPS - Influencers%' THEN REPLACE(dig.[Offer.name], ' CPS - Influencers', '')
        WHEN dig.[Offer.name] LIKE '% _Coupons%' THEN REPLACE(dig.[Offer.name], ' _Coupons', '')
        WHEN dig.[Offer.name] LIKE '% CPS-KSA, UAE and KWT%' THEN REPLACE(dig.[Offer.name], ' CPS-KSA, UAE and KWT', '')
        WHEN dig.[Offer.name] LIKE '% CPS \KSA Coupon%' THEN REPLACE(dig.[Offer.name], ' CPS \KSA Coupon ', '')
        WHEN dig.[Offer.name] LIKE '% CPS - Coupons UAE & KSA%' THEN REPLACE(dig.[Offer.name], ' CPS - Coupons UAE & KSA', '')
        WHEN dig.[Offer.name] LIKE '% CPS - Coupons UAE and KSA%' THEN REPLACE(dig.[Offer.name], ' CPS - Coupons UAE and KSA', '')
        WHEN dig.[Offer.name] LIKE '% KSA & UAE%' THEN REPLACE(dig.[Offer.name], ' KSA & UAE', '')
        WHEN dig.[Offer.name] LIKE '%CPS GCC-Coupons%' THEN REPLACE(dig.[Offer.name], 'CPS GCC-Coupons', '')
        WHEN dig.[Offer.name] LIKE '%- CPS Coupons GCC%' THEN REPLACE(dig.[Offer.name], '- CPS Coupons GCC', '')
        WHEN dig.[Offer.name] LIKE '%- CPS Links%' THEN REPLACE(dig.[Offer.name], '- CPS Links', '')
        WHEN dig.[Offer.name] LIKE '%-CPS%' THEN REPLACE(dig.[Offer.name], '-CPS', '')
        WHEN dig.[Offer.name] LIKE '%KSA- CPS%' THEN REPLACE(dig.[Offer.name], 'KSA- CPS', '')
        WHEN dig.[Offer.name] LIKE '%- CPS%' THEN REPLACE(dig.[Offer.name], '- CPS', '')
        WHEN dig.[Offer.name] LIKE '%CPS%' THEN REPLACE(dig.[Offer.name], 'CPS', '')
        WHEN dig.[Offer.name] LIKE '%Coupons%' THEN REPLACE(dig.[Offer.name], 'Coupons', '')
        WHEN dig.[Offer.name] LIKE '%_CPS' THEN REPLACE(dig.[Offer.name], '_CPS', '')
        WHEN dig.[Offer.name] LIKE '%_CPO' THEN REPLACE(dig.[Offer.name], '_CPO', '')
        WHEN dig.[Offer.name] LIKE '%_web' THEN REPLACE(dig.[Offer.name], '_web', '')
        WHEN dig.[Offer.name] LIKE '%_ksa' THEN REPLACE(dig.[Offer.name], '_ksa', '')
        WHEN dig.[Offer.name] LIKE '% - plt%' THEN REPLACE(dig.[Offer.name], ' - plt', '')
        WHEN dig.[Offer.name] LIKE '% - maf%' THEN REPLACE(dig.[Offer.name], ' - maf', '')
        WHEN dig.[Offer.name] LIKE '% - rakuten%' THEN REPLACE(dig.[Offer.name], ' - rakuten', '')
        WHEN dig.[Offer.name] LIKE '% (tbs)' THEN REPLACE(dig.[Offer.name], ' (tbs)', '')
        WHEN dig.[Offer.name] LIKE '% (durrapro)' THEN REPLACE(dig.[Offer.name], ' (durrapro)', '')

        -- General replacements
        WHEN dig.[Offer.name] LIKE '%_%' THEN REPLACE(dig.[Offer.name], '_', ' ')

        ELSE dig.[Offer.name]
    END AS Brand,
    [Offer.name],
    [Goal.name],
    [Stat.promo_code],
    [Country.name],
    [Stat.affiliate_info1],
    [Stat.impressions],
    [Stat.conversions],
    [Stat.clicks],
    [Stat.payout],
    [Stat.currency],
    [Stat.payout_type],
    [Stat.date],
    [Stat.sale_amount],
    [Stat.ctr],
    [Stat.ltr],
    [Stat.offer_id],
    [Offer.id],
    [Goal.id],
    [Country.code],
    currency_payout,
    sale_amount,
    input_file_name,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS update_timestamp
FROM 
    raw.digizag_raw dig
WHERE 
    dig.[Stat.payout] != '649249.585900'

SELECT
    Website,
    CASE
        -- Specific replacements first
        WHEN LEFT([Adv. Campaign], CHARINDEX(' ', [Adv. Campaign] + ' ') - 1) LIKE '%Beluar Bukhoor%' THEN 'Beluar'
        WHEN LEFT([Adv. Campaign], CHARINDEX(' ', [Adv. Campaign] + ' ') - 1) LIKE '%Foot locker%' THEN 'Footlocker'
        WHEN LEFT([Adv. Campaign], CHARINDEX(' ', [Adv. Campaign] + ' ') - 1) LIKE '%Levelshoes%' THEN 'Level Shoes'
        WHEN LEFT([Adv. Campaign], CHARINDEX(' ', [Adv. Campaign] + ' ') - 1) LIKE '%Mr. Mandoob%' THEN 'Mrmandoob'
        WHEN LEFT([Adv. Campaign], CHARINDEX(' ', [Adv. Campaign] + ' ') - 1) LIKE '%Sun & Sand%' THEN 'Sun & Sands Sports'
        WHEN LEFT([Adv. Campaign], CHARINDEX(' ', [Adv. Campaign] + ' ') - 1) LIKE '%HOMEBOX%' THEN 'Home Box'
        WHEN LEFT([Adv. Campaign], CHARINDEX(' ', [Adv. Campaign] + ' ') - 1) = '6thstreet' THEN '6th Street'
        WHEN LEFT([Adv. Campaign], CHARINDEX(' ', [Adv. Campaign] + ' ') - 1) = 'Bath & body works' THEN 'Bath and body works'
        WHEN LEFT([Adv. Campaign], CHARINDEX(' ', [Adv. Campaign] + ' ') - 1) LIKE '%Airalo%' THEN 'Airalo'
        WHEN LEFT([Adv. Campaign], CHARINDEX(' ', [Adv. Campaign] + ' ') - 1) = 'Toysrus' THEN 'Toys r us'
        WHEN LEFT([Adv. Campaign], CHARINDEX(' ', [Adv. Campaign] + ' ') - 1) = 'First cry' THEN 'Firstcry'
        WHEN LEFT([Adv. Campaign], CHARINDEX(' ', [Adv. Campaign] + ' ') - 1) = 'Foot locker' THEN 'Footlocker'
        WHEN LEFT([Adv. Campaign], CHARINDEX(' ', [Adv. Campaign] + ' ') - 1) = 'Go sport' THEN 'Go sports'
        WHEN LEFT([Adv. Campaign], CHARINDEX(' ', [Adv. Campaign] + ' ') - 1) = 'Izil' THEN 'Izil Beauty'
        WHEN LEFT([Adv. Campaign], CHARINDEX(' ', [Adv. Campaign] + ' ') - 1) LIKE '%Munch%' THEN 'Munch bakery'
        WHEN LEFT([Adv. Campaign], CHARINDEX(' ', [Adv. Campaign] + ' ') - 1) LIKE '%Basharacare%' THEN 'Bashara Care'
        WHEN LEFT([Adv. Campaign], CHARINDEX(' ', [Adv. Campaign] + ' ') - 1) LIKE '%Dropkicks%' THEN 'Dropkick'
        WHEN LEFT([Adv. Campaign], CHARINDEX(' ', [Adv. Campaign] + ' ') - 1) LIKE '%Temu%' THEN 'Temu'

        -- Handle common patterns
        WHEN LEFT([Adv. Campaign], CHARINDEX(' ', [Adv. Campaign] + ' ') - 1) LIKE '% CPS - Influencers%' THEN REPLACE(LEFT([Adv. Campaign], CHARINDEX(' ', [Adv. Campaign] + ' ') - 1), ' CPS - Influencers', '')
        WHEN LEFT([Adv. Campaign], CHARINDEX(' ', [Adv. Campaign] + ' ') - 1) LIKE '% _Coupons%' THEN REPLACE(LEFT([Adv. Campaign], CHARINDEX(' ', [Adv. Campaign] + ' ') - 1), ' _Coupons', '')
        WHEN LEFT([Adv. Campaign], CHARINDEX(' ', [Adv. Campaign] + ' ') - 1) LIKE '% CPS-KSA, UAE and KWT%' THEN REPLACE(LEFT([Adv. Campaign], CHARINDEX(' ', [Adv. Campaign] + ' ') - 1), ' CPS-KSA, UAE and KWT', '')
        WHEN LEFT([Adv. Campaign], CHARINDEX(' ', [Adv. Campaign] + ' ') - 1) LIKE '% CPS \KSA Coupon%' THEN REPLACE(LEFT([Adv. Campaign], CHARINDEX(' ', [Adv. Campaign] + ' ') - 1), ' CPS \KSA Coupon ', '')
        WHEN LEFT([Adv. Campaign], CHARINDEX(' ', [Adv. Campaign] + ' ') - 1) LIKE '% CPS - Coupons UAE & KSA%' THEN REPLACE(LEFT([Adv. Campaign], CHARINDEX(' ', [Adv. Campaign] + ' ') - 1), ' CPS - Coupons UAE & KSA', '')
        WHEN LEFT([Adv. Campaign], CHARINDEX(' ', [Adv. Campaign] + ' ') - 1) LIKE '% CPS - Coupons UAE and KSA%' THEN REPLACE(LEFT([Adv. Campaign], CHARINDEX(' ', [Adv. Campaign] + ' ') - 1), ' CPS - Coupons UAE and KSA', '')
        WHEN LEFT([Adv. Campaign], CHARINDEX(' ', [Adv. Campaign] + ' ') - 1) LIKE '% KSA & UAE%' THEN REPLACE(LEFT([Adv. Campaign], CHARINDEX(' ', [Adv. Campaign] + ' ') - 1), ' KSA & UAE', '')
        WHEN LEFT([Adv. Campaign], CHARINDEX(' ', [Adv. Campaign] + ' ') - 1) LIKE '%CPS GCC-Coupons%' THEN REPLACE(LEFT([Adv. Campaign], CHARINDEX(' ', [Adv. Campaign] + ' ') - 1), 'CPS GCC-Coupons', '')
        WHEN LEFT([Adv. Campaign], CHARINDEX(' ', [Adv. Campaign] + ' ') - 1) LIKE '%- CPS Coupons GCC%' THEN REPLACE(LEFT([Adv. Campaign], CHARINDEX(' ', [Adv. Campaign] + ' ') - 1), '- CPS Coupons GCC', '')
        WHEN LEFT([Adv. Campaign], CHARINDEX(' ', [Adv. Campaign] + ' ') - 1) LIKE '%- CPS Links%' THEN REPLACE(LEFT([Adv. Campaign], CHARINDEX(' ', [Adv. Campaign] + ' ') - 1), '- CPS Links', '')
        WHEN LEFT([Adv. Campaign], CHARINDEX(' ', [Adv. Campaign] + ' ') - 1) LIKE '%-CPS%' THEN REPLACE(LEFT([Adv. Campaign], CHARINDEX(' ', [Adv. Campaign] + ' ') - 1), '-CPS', '')
        WHEN LEFT([Adv. Campaign], CHARINDEX(' ', [Adv. Campaign] + ' ') - 1) LIKE '%KSA- CPS%' THEN REPLACE(LEFT([Adv. Campaign], CHARINDEX(' ', [Adv. Campaign] + ' ') - 1), 'KSA- CPS', '')
        WHEN LEFT([Adv. Campaign], CHARINDEX(' ', [Adv. Campaign] + ' ') - 1) LIKE '%- CPS%' THEN REPLACE(LEFT([Adv. Campaign], CHARINDEX(' ', [Adv. Campaign] + ' ') - 1), '- CPS', '')
        WHEN LEFT([Adv. Campaign], CHARINDEX(' ', [Adv. Campaign] + ' ') - 1) LIKE '%CPS%' THEN REPLACE(LEFT([Adv. Campaign], CHARINDEX(' ', [Adv. Campaign] + ' ') - 1), 'CPS', '')
        WHEN LEFT([Adv. Campaign], CHARINDEX(' ', [Adv. Campaign] + ' ') - 1) LIKE '%Coupons%' THEN REPLACE(LEFT([Adv. Campaign], CHARINDEX(' ', [Adv. Campaign] + ' ') - 1), 'Coupons', '')
        WHEN LEFT([Adv. Campaign], CHARINDEX(' ', [Adv. Campaign] + ' ') - 1) LIKE '%_CPS' THEN REPLACE(LEFT([Adv. Campaign], CHARINDEX(' ', [Adv. Campaign] + ' ') - 1), '_CPS', '')
        WHEN LEFT([Adv. Campaign], CHARINDEX(' ', [Adv. Campaign] + ' ') - 1) LIKE '%_CPO' THEN REPLACE(LEFT([Adv. Campaign], CHARINDEX(' ', [Adv. Campaign] + ' ') - 1), '_CPO', '')
        WHEN LEFT([Adv. Campaign], CHARINDEX(' ', [Adv. Campaign] + ' ') - 1) LIKE '%_web' THEN REPLACE(LEFT([Adv. Campaign], CHARINDEX(' ', [Adv. Campaign] + ' ') - 1), '_web', '')
        WHEN LEFT([Adv. Campaign], CHARINDEX(' ', [Adv. Campaign] + ' ') - 1) LIKE '%_ksa' THEN REPLACE(LEFT([Adv. Campaign], CHARINDEX(' ', [Adv. Campaign] + ' ') - 1), '_ksa', '')
        WHEN LEFT([Adv. Campaign], CHARINDEX(' ', [Adv. Campaign] + ' ') - 1) LIKE '% - plt%' THEN REPLACE(LEFT([Adv. Campaign], CHARINDEX(' ', [Adv. Campaign] + ' ') - 1), ' - plt', '')
        WHEN LEFT([Adv. Campaign], CHARINDEX(' ', [Adv. Campaign] + ' ') - 1) LIKE '% - maf%' THEN REPLACE(LEFT([Adv. Campaign], CHARINDEX(' ', [Adv. Campaign] + ' ') - 1), ' - maf', '')
        WHEN LEFT([Adv. Campaign], CHARINDEX(' ', [Adv. Campaign] + ' ') - 1) LIKE '% - rakuten%' THEN REPLACE(LEFT([Adv. Campaign], CHARINDEX(' ', [Adv. Campaign] + ' ') - 1), ' - rakuten', '')
        WHEN LEFT([Adv. Campaign], CHARINDEX(' ', [Adv. Campaign] + ' ') - 1) LIKE '% (tbs)' THEN REPLACE(LEFT([Adv. Campaign], CHARINDEX(' ', [Adv. Campaign] + ' ') - 1), ' (tbs)', '')
        WHEN LEFT([Adv. Campaign], CHARINDEX(' ', [Adv. Campaign] + ' ') - 1) LIKE '% (durrapro)' THEN REPLACE(LEFT([Adv. Campaign], CHARINDEX(' ', [Adv. Campaign] + ' ') - 1), ' (durrapro)', '')

        -- General replacements
        WHEN LEFT([Adv. Campaign], CHARINDEX(' ', [Adv. Campaign] + ' ') - 1) LIKE '%_%' THEN REPLACE(LEFT([Adv. Campaign], CHARINDEX(' ', [Adv. Campaign] + ' ') - 1), '_', ' ')

        ELSE LEFT([Adv. Campaign], CHARINDEX(' ', [Adv. Campaign] + ' ') - 1)
    END AS [Adv. Campaign],
    [Click Time],
    [Action Time],
    [Conversion Time],
    [Action ID],
    [Action name],
    [Order Sum],
    Status,
    [Date of processing],
    Payment,
    [Order ID],
    Promocode,
    SubID,
    SubID1,
    SubID2,
    SubID3,
    SubID4,
    Keyword,
    Comment,
    ID,
    [Product Name],
    [Product Image],
    [Product Url],
    [Product Country Code],
    [Product Category ID],
    [Product category name],
    input_file_name,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS update_timestamp
FROM 
    raw.admitads_raw adm
WHERE 
    Website = 'sahseh'

select
Order_Date,
Discount_Code,
User_Type,
Orders,
Sales,
input_file_name,
current_timestamp as update_timestamp
from raw.[6thstreet_raw]

SELECT
    REPLACE(CASE
        -- Specific replacements first
        WHEN plt.Campaign LIKE '%Beluar Bukhoor%' THEN 'Beluar'
        WHEN plt.Campaign LIKE '%Foot locker%' THEN 'Footlocker'
        WHEN plt.Campaign LIKE '%Levelshoes%' THEN 'Level Shoes'
        WHEN plt.Campaign LIKE '%Mr. Mandoob%' THEN 'Mrmandoob'
        WHEN plt.Campaign LIKE '%Sun & Sand%' THEN 'Sun & Sands Sports'
        WHEN plt.Campaign LIKE '%HOMEBOX%' THEN 'Home Box'
        WHEN plt.Campaign = '6thstreet' THEN '6th Street'
        WHEN plt.Campaign = 'Bath & body works' THEN 'Bath and body works'
        WHEN plt.Campaign LIKE '%Airalo%' THEN 'Airalo'
        WHEN plt.Campaign = 'Toysrus' THEN 'Toys r us'
        WHEN plt.Campaign = 'First cry' THEN 'Firstcry'
        WHEN plt.Campaign = 'Foot locker' THEN 'Footlocker'
        WHEN plt.Campaign = 'Go sport' THEN 'Go sports'
        WHEN plt.Campaign = 'Izil' THEN 'Izil Beauty'
        WHEN plt.Campaign LIKE '%Munch%' THEN 'Munch bakery'
        WHEN plt.Campaign LIKE '%Basharacare%' THEN 'Bashara Care'
        WHEN plt.Campaign LIKE '%Dropkicks%' THEN 'Dropkick'
        WHEN plt.Campaign LIKE '%Temu%' THEN 'Temu'

        -- Handle common patterns
        WHEN plt.Campaign LIKE '% CPS - Influencers%' THEN REPLACE(plt.Campaign, ' CPS - Influencers', '')
        WHEN plt.Campaign LIKE '% _Coupons%' THEN REPLACE(plt.Campaign, ' _Coupons', '')
        WHEN plt.Campaign LIKE '% CPS-KSA, UAE and KWT%' THEN REPLACE(plt.Campaign, ' CPS-KSA, UAE and KWT', '')
        WHEN plt.Campaign LIKE '% CPS \KSA Coupon%' THEN REPLACE(plt.Campaign, ' CPS \KSA Coupon', '')
        WHEN plt.Campaign LIKE '% CPS - Coupons UAE & KSA%' THEN REPLACE(plt.Campaign, ' CPS - Coupons UAE & KSA', '')
        WHEN plt.Campaign LIKE '% CPS - Coupons UAE and KSA%' THEN REPLACE(plt.Campaign, ' CPS - Coupons UAE and KSA', '')
        WHEN plt.Campaign LIKE '% KSA & UAE%' THEN REPLACE(plt.Campaign, ' KSA & UAE', '')
        WHEN plt.Campaign LIKE '%CPS GCC-Coupons%' THEN REPLACE(plt.Campaign, 'CPS GCC-Coupons', '')
        WHEN plt.Campaign LIKE '%- CPS Coupons GCC%' THEN REPLACE(plt.Campaign, '- CPS Coupons GCC', '')
        WHEN plt.Campaign LIKE '%- CPS Links%' THEN REPLACE(plt.Campaign, '- CPS Links', '')
        WHEN plt.Campaign LIKE '%-CPS%' THEN REPLACE(plt.Campaign, '-CPS', '')
        WHEN plt.Campaign LIKE '%KSA- CPS%' THEN REPLACE(plt.Campaign, 'KSA- CPS', '')
        WHEN plt.Campaign LIKE '%- CPS%' THEN REPLACE(plt.Campaign, '- CPS', '')
        WHEN plt.Campaign LIKE '%CPS%' THEN REPLACE(plt.Campaign, 'CPS', '')
        WHEN plt.Campaign LIKE '%Coupons%' THEN REPLACE(plt.Campaign, 'Coupons', '')
        WHEN plt.Campaign LIKE '%_CPS' THEN REPLACE(plt.Campaign, '_CPS', '')
        WHEN plt.Campaign LIKE '%_CPO' THEN REPLACE(plt.Campaign, '_CPO', '')
        WHEN plt.Campaign LIKE '%_web' THEN REPLACE(plt.Campaign, '_web', '')
        WHEN plt.Campaign LIKE '%_ksa' THEN REPLACE(plt.Campaign, '_ksa', '')
        WHEN plt.Campaign LIKE '% - plt%' THEN REPLACE(plt.Campaign, ' - plt', '')
        WHEN plt.Campaign LIKE '% - maf%' THEN REPLACE(plt.Campaign, ' - maf', '')
        WHEN plt.Campaign LIKE '% - rakuten%' THEN REPLACE(plt.Campaign, ' - rakuten', '')
        WHEN plt.Campaign LIKE '% (tbs)' THEN REPLACE(plt.Campaign, ' (tbs)', '')
        WHEN plt.Campaign LIKE '% (durrapro)' THEN REPLACE(plt.Campaign, ' (durrapro)', '')

        -- General replacements
        WHEN plt.Campaign LIKE '%_%' THEN REPLACE(plt.Campaign, '_', ' ')

        ELSE plt.Campaign
    END, '_', ' ') AS Campaign, -- Apply final replacement of underscores

    [Goal Name],
    [Coupon Code],
    [Country (GEO)],
    Date,
    Payout,
    [payout in USD],
    Conversions,
    [Sale Amount],
    [saleAmount in USD],
    [Pending Sale Amount],
    [pendingSaleAmount in USD],
    [Pending Conversions],
    [Pending Payout],
    [pendingPayout in USD],
    input_file_name,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS update_timestamp
FROM 
    raw.platformance_raw plt
WHERE 
    CAST(date AS DATE) >= '2024-01-01';
